title: 820-2936 Green Light, no fan, Burned LCD cable
message:
Hello everyone,

Green light on MagSafe, No Fan spin.
No signs of water damage on the board.
LCD cable burned.
Short to ground on Pin 4 of LCD connector J9000
Deep crater caused by an explosion near pin 2 of F9700.

Please advice how to proceed.

Thanks!

title: 820-2936 Green Light, no fan, Burned LCD cable
message: Damn lol everyone having this problem! Is PPBUS present? Remove F9700 and see if any change in powering on

title: 820-2936 Green Light, no fan, Burned LCD cable
message:
2-3 recent posts on the forum about F9700.
Find them and follow the advices.
If you can solve that problem, next change J9000 and rebuild its traces.
Be sure no shorts (nor low values) on J9000 after all.
Don't forget to  check L9008.
